title: Is it just my pc or the server?
body: So unlucky man, I was playing and I was 1-1 in my promos so I went to play and then while in champ select my client crashed and I dodged making me lose the game and my series, Rito doesn't seem to want me to climb to the rank I desire. Tis unlucky. Is anyone else having a crash problem or what? Cause I haven't had this problem before.

replies.body:
Crashes in champ select are usually caused by your connection to the matchmaking server dropping off suddenly. This can be caused by a number of things, however, the most common are conflicting settings configured on your network. Our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) is a great place to start troubleshooting this, as it covers the steps that frequently fix this.

Let me know if this helped.
